name: Futuristic LowPoly Vehicles and Buildings
description:
This is a pack of 3D models I created for a game I never released. I did post a Gameplay Video on reddit if you want to see them in action.

The models are low-poly and feature a glowing outline. Some are animated.

Godot .escn exports are also included.

I'd love to know if you use them in your project!
